metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0194 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability inthe kernel mode layer driver, where an invalid display configuration maylead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
